channel.title: Ip problems
channel.description:
everybody that logs in into my server logs in with the ip : 192.168.0.1 but the problem is, no1 can get a starter now because everybody gots the same ip adres, someone know how to change it so everybody get his own ip adress?
thanks already;)

item.title: Ip problems
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“xneonx, post:6, topic:437816”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=540519.msg3958872#msg3958872 date=1333062874]

You could try to make it so each character gets a starter and not the ip. Like when a new character logs in for the first time they receive a starter pack.

You shouldn’t do that since when you would ban some one everyone is banned, you need to solve the ip problem.
So I guess take a look where it is handled
[/quote]
Actually no. My server is set so when someone logs in for the first time they receive their pack then it labels it in their character file “starter = 1” or something like that and the server will then check their account when they log in again and it’ll see that they already have received their pack.[/quote]
Most servers handle it like that, I was saying he should fix the ip problem instead of using it like that.
It’s like cleaning your room and dumping everything under your bed, it will work, but the problem is still there

Read full topic

item.title: Ip problems
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

I’ve actually gotten this error on my server before. It was annoying as hell but thankfully went away after a while. It happens because of problems with your router. If this problem persists, try getting a new one.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip problems
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:4, topic:437816”][quote author=xneonx link=topic=540519.msg3958867#msg3958867 date=1333062552]
You could try to make it so each character gets a starter and not the ip. Like when a new character logs in for the first time they receive a starter pack.
[/quote]
You shouldn’t do that since when you would ban some one everyone is banned, you need to solve the ip problem.
So I guess take a look where it is handled[/quote]
Actually no. My server is set so when someone logs in for the first time they receive their pack then it labels it in their character file “starter = 1” or something like that and the server will then check their account when they log in again and it’ll see that they already have received their pack.

Read full topic

if they didnt recieve an item that means they made 2 accs on same ip there simple…
